bike.description: Specialized FACT 6r carbon, triple monocoque construction, compact race geometry, Zertz seatstay inserts

components.description: Specialized FACT monocoque carbon fork; full carbon legs, crown and steerer, with Speed Zertz
Specialized Mindset, 1 1/8" integrated threadless, sealed cartridge bearings, carbon 20mm cone with two 5mm alloy spacers
Specialized Pro-Set lightweight stem, 3D forged alloy, 4-bolt 31.8mm bar clamp, 4- position adjustable
Specialized Pro lightweight handlebar, all aluminum, racing drop, 31.8 clamp
Body Geometry Bar Phat, cork ribbon with 2.5mm gel padding
Shimano 105, double crankset, Hollowtech II, 2-piece design
Shimano 105 External alloy cups, Sealed cartridge bearings
Body Geometry Alias, carbon reinfoced base, microfiber cover
Specialized Pav√© FACT carbon seatpost with Zertz insert, 27.2mm
Chain stay protector, reflectors, clear coat, owners manual
